FuncDef: This command specifies the field/option of DHCP packet that is used to match against the radius-proxy-server cache.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to match the circuit-id in DHCP option82.
Specifies to match the MAC address of DHCP client.
Specifies to use the specified DHCP option. Values-1 to 254.
Specifies to use the specified DHCP option. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies the DHCPv6 option to retrieve the value to be used as lookup key in the RADIUS Proxy cache. Values-1 to 65535.
